statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{11 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 9 , -5 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 2 \, x - 6 , -6 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - x - 3 , x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 3 , -6 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - x - 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
